name: Trampoline toe man!
description:
Dear Players.

Trampoline toe man is a man that jumps too high. you have to hit his head on blocks to prevent from flying off the map!! Have fun solving this puzzle_like platformer! Remember this is only the demo. So it has only two levels to see if people like the concept. I will be releasing the full version soon :) . Thanks for downloading my first game on itch.io!

Sincerly -The_kid_dever
